data: {"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ここでは","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":true,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ゲームモードを選択できるようにする","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"問題になります。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"皆さんも、あるゲームをやり込んでいたら","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"普通のモードじゃ物足りなくなって、同じゲームを難しいモードにしてもう一度プレイする","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ということをやったことがあると思います。この","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"gray"},"plain_text":"Numer0n","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"も同じで、3桁モードの","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"gray"},"plain_text":"Numer0n","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"と4桁モードの","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"gray"},"plain_text":"Numer0n","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"では難易度が大きく変わります。その理由は明らかで、3桁モードの場合は答えが","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"720通り","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"に対し、4桁モードの場合は","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"5040通り","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"もあります。まさに桁違いの難易度です。このゲームをプレイしていくうちに","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"熟練者","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"という人が出てくるので、その人のために作るっていう感じですね。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ここで必要となる新たな知識はありません。ただ、ここでヒントとなることを言っておくと、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":true,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"正解の数字を決めていた場所はどこなのか","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":true,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"正解の数字やその桁数を扱っていた場所はどこなのか","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ということを考えれば、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"どこを書き換えたらいいのか、そしてどこに新たなコードを書けばいいのか","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"が自ずと見えてくるかもしれません。それでは、頑張って作ってみましょう。","href":null}]}
